name: Fen
description: A low-lying fen creates a unique wetland ecosystem with rare plants and animals. The alkaline water preserves organic materials, while the unstable ground and limited access make it a natural fortress for those who know its secrets.
atmosphere: Rare plants and animals create special, almost magical place. Air carries rare flowers, wet earth, and alkaline water scent. Ground soft and treacherous with hidden pools. Unstable ground and limited access create natural fortress feeling. Alkaline waters create unique ecosystems. Hidden channels can trap unwary.
